com.mesosphere.sdk.testing

Class ClusterState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.testing.ClusterState

  • public class ClusterState
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of the state of a cluster. Effectively a log of prior offers and task launches during a test run.

    • Method Summary

      • getLastLaunchedPod

        public LaunchedPod getLastLaunchedPod(java.lang.String podName)
        Returns the last pod to be launched with the specified name.
        Parameters:
        podName - name+index of the pod, of the form "podtype-#"
        Returns:
        a list of tasks which were included in the pod
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if no such pod was found
        See Also:
        getLastLaunchedPod()
